title: Swift 3 Programming using iOS 10 Features
headline: Sharpen your app development skills in Swift 3 and the latest iOS 10 programming features with this free online course.
description: Swift language is now replacing all the other languages in developing iOS applications. Swift 3.0 is the latest release since the language was made open-source by Apple and boasts many new advanced features. This course, ‘Swift 3 Programming using iOS 10 Features’, is a masterclass designed to help modernise your talents, taking you through all the developments and refinements in Swift 3.0 and upgrading your Swift coding skills.

courseDescription:
Swift is fast becoming the only choice for developing iOS apps and Apple applications for programmers and developers around the globe. Now open-sourced, this general-purpose language is drawing the attention of developers and is now the first choice for programmers who wish to develop Apple suites, software and apps. Its popularity has led to the release of a more improved and refined version of the language in Swift 3.0. If you are a programmer working with Swift, you can upgrade yourself with the latest Swift to create modern, relevant apps. This course will accelerate your learning with Swift 3 and iOS 10 features. 

This self-paced online course is focused primarily on Swift 3.0. It begins with an overview of the Swift fundamentals and covers the new syntax in Swift 3.0. Then we guide you through all the components and features, from classes and methods, message integrations, notifications and SiriKit implementation. Each section provides practical knowledge so you make an app relevant to the new iOS 10 feature on that topic. The codes and guides for projects undertaken are in the form of a downloadable zip file in the ‘Resource’ section. Do not forget to download them as you move ahead through the chapters. The skills and knowledge you gain will be helpful for your future Swift project or assignments with iOS 10.

This course is a perfect opportunity for professionals or programmers who want to improve their Swift programming-related skills and expertise to a higher level. It will help you learn the basics of programming in Swift 3 from scratch and is an excellent opportunity for a beginner who has no prior knowledge or idea of Swift 3 but wants to learn more. The content can also be helpful for programmers as a reference guide. By the end of this course, you'll be able to use the latest iOS features with Swift 3.0 to your advantage, develop various applications and gain confidence. So join today and be ready to apply your Swift 3 for iOS 10 skills.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, you start with the fundamentals of Swift and learn to create a project by adding UI layout and auto layout by wiring it up and understanding the syntax in Swift 3. You will get familiar with swift elements like conditionals, enum, arrays, pickerview, and the switch statement. You then are hand-walked to build a module dedicated app.
topics: Introduction to Swift 3 Language Concepts – Learning Outcomes
Wiring Up The Interface and Measurement
Introduction to Swift 3 Language Concepts - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.details: Classes and Methods in Swift 3 Language
modules.description: This module dug into the function, creation and application of classes and methods in Swift 3. Start learning the use of table views and feeding it with data into an application created for our learning. You then get into classes and see how to put a code and understand its use. You then are guided to build a module-dedicated app.
topics: Classes and  Methods in Swift 3 Language- Learning Outcomes
Classes and Methods in Swift 3 Language - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This module first gets you to understand iMessage and integrate this extension with your application. You then get familiar with notifications, types, and utilisation. Move on to learn about Sirikit and its implementation. Then get engaged with a project by applying the features and elements you learned with downloadable instructions and codes.
topics: Message Integrations, Notifications and Sirikit  – Learning Outcomes
Message Integrations, Notifications and Sirikit - Lesson Summary
